EmailTemplate.description: Use this text email template as an auto-response informing the customer that a Case has been opened. It instructs the customer to respond directly to the email to update the Case, but without the designated markers -- appearing less like a system-generated email. Includes merge fields for the auto-population of Case Number, Status, Priority Level, Subject, and Description.
EmailTemplate.name: New Case Auto Response w/o Markers (text)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject} {!Case.E2CP__Case_Thread_Id__c}
